fix.item: URL validation now uses parse_url() instead of filter_var() to support URLs with special characters (e.g., Google Maps embed URLs with exclamation marks in query parameters).

addition.item: Installer script to require Joomla 5.4+ and migrate legacy params (privacy link fields, allowfullscreen false value, overlay position).
Privacy card and privacy bar UI with configurable placement, integrated or separate layout, and style controls (colors, radius, shadows).
Consent controls: toggle/button/both, load delay, consent scope (module/domain/global), session or local storage, and YouTube/Vimeo autoplay.
Responsive video container with ratio presets, background overlay color/blur controls, and region label override for accessibility.
Link picker field to select privacy links from articles or menu items.
Modular template partials (helpers, variables, card, bar, inline CSS) and dedicated JS asset for behavior.

change.item: Template markup restructured with BEM classes and data attributes; behavior moved from inline scripts to the JS asset.
CSS rewritten to style placeholders, cards, bars, toggle control, and reduced-motion handling.
iFrame source handling now accepts embed codes, normalizes protocol-relative/relative URLs, validates URLs, and uses a fallback title.
Parameter UI reorganized into tabs (Before, Privacy, iFrame, Behaviour, Advanced) with updated help text and translations.
Update server URL moved to GitHub releases; manifest metadata updated for version 3.0.0.
Donation message and module description text updated.

remove.item: Legacy privacy link params (displayprivacypolicy, privacypolicy, privacypolicytext) replaced by the new privacy link fields.
Legacy button position settings for reveal/disable controls in favor of the privacy card layout.
